text: Douglas Matías Arezo Martínez (born 21 November 2002) is a Uruguayan professional footballer who plays as a striker for Primera División club River Plate Montevideo. ==Club career== An academy graduate of River Plate Montevideo, Arezo made his professional debut on 14 July 2019 in a 0–0 draw against Progreso. He scored his first professional goal on 10 August 2019, in a 2–1 league win against Juventud. ==International career== Arezo is a current Uruguay youth international and has represented his nation at 2017 South American U-15 Championship and 2019 South American U-17 Championship.
